features: PREMIUM QUALITY - Masterly crafted 100% Polyester blackout curtains. Sold as a single panel (Panel measures 42" wide and 84" long).
LIGHT BLOCKING LEVEL - Eclipse Blackout Curtains blocks out between 98% to 99.9% of sunlight and harmful UV rays and ensures upmost privacy. Perfect for your living room, bedroom, nursery and more!

ENERGY EFFICIENT - Patented Thermaback technology designed to block out intrusive sunlight reduces unwanted noise and offers thermal benefits while providing all of the luxury and style of naturally flowing draperies. Provides an insulated barrier against summer heat and winter chill to balance your room temperature and save on energy bills.
EASY SET UP - Grommet Top design fits any standard or decorative rod for quick and easy installation. Ready to be hung right away.
CARE INSTRUCTIONS - Machine washable in gentle cycle and cold water, do not bleach. Warm iron and tumble dry at low temperatures.
body.description: Experience the darkness, silence and beauty of Eclipse curtains. Whether you are looking to enhance your existing decor or create a whole new look, Eclipse curtains give you the versatility and style you need to decorate any room in your home. The innovative foam-back technology provides all of the light-blocking, noise reducing and energy Saving benefits, while providing the same fashionable style and elegance of naturally flowing curtains. From traditional to contemporary decor, ultra-soft microfiber thermal curtain panels enhance any living space. The super-soft hand and luxurious drapability of microfiber combined with the Eclipse Thermaback technology ensures the ultimate in fashion and function. Hang two or more rod pocket window panels on a standard or decorative rod for optimal coverage. Foam backing is an off white for street-view requirements. Decorative rod sold separately. 100Percent easy clean polyester. Machine wash, tumble dry, do not bleach. Imported.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Experience the darkness, silence and beauty of Eclipse curtains. Eclipse blackout panels have been laboratory-tested to block out over 99% of intrusive light, unwanted noise and can help you save on home heating and cooling costs. Eclipse curtains offer a unique blend of fashion and function for any home decor. Eclipse curtains are perfect for the bedroom, kid's room or nursery, providing the ideal sleep environment for the whole family. The magic is in the Thermaback construction. Eclipse Microfiber Collection Opacity Level: Blackout This light blocking level is recommended for bedrooms, living rooms, dens, playrooms, or any room where you may want the appearance of darkness, while still having enough light to navigate throughout the room. Blackout curtains are also the perfect choice on windows that tend to radiate heat, as they provide optimal thermal protection without creating a pitch black environment. PREMIUM QUALITY - Masterly crafted 100% Polyester blackout curtains. Sold as a single panel (Panel measures 42" wide and 63" long). LIGHT BLOCKING LEVEL - Eclipse Blackout Curtains blocks out between 98% to 99.9% of sunlight and harmful UV rays and ensures upmost privacy. Perfect for your living room, bedroom, nursery and more! ENERGY EFFICIENT - Thermaback technology to block out intrusive sunlight reduces unwanted noise and offers thermal benefits while providing all of the luxury and style of naturally flowing draperies. EASY SET UP - Grommet Top design fits any standard or decorative rod for quick and easy installation. Ready to be hung right away.

Experience the darkness, silence, and beauty of Eclipse curtains. The patented Thermaback technology and innovative design helps conserve heat in winter and keeps hot sunrays out in summer to help reduce home heating and cooling costs. Whether you are looking to enhance your existing decor or going for a complete room makeover, Eclipse curtains give you the versatility and style you need to decorate any room in your home. Rods sold separately. 100-Percent Polyester. Machine wash, tumble dry, do not bleach. Imported.

Features & Highlights Opacity Level This light blocking level is recommended for bedrooms, living rooms, dens, playrooms, or any room where you may want the appearance of darkness, while still having enough light to navigate throughout the room. Blackout curtains are also the perfect choice on windows that tend to radiate heat, as they provide optimal thermal protection without creating a pitch black environment. Thermaback Technology Patented Thermaback technology designed to block out intrusive sunlight reduces unwanted noise and offers thermal benefits while providing all of the luxury and style of naturally flowing draperies. Provides an insulated barrier against summer heat and winter chill to balance your room temperature and save on energy bills. Premium Quality 100% Polyester - Masterly crafted curtains. Machine washable in gentle cycle and cold water, do not bleach. Warm iron and tumble dry at low temperatures.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Hardly any light!
reviews.reviewText: These are super easy to put up and the color is spot on! They are thick , they let in barley any light! Perfect!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My thermal off yellow curtains are so pretty. In my Bedroom. I have ordered a new bedspread for my bed and I would rather wait until I get it to take pictures. However., my curtains keep out the street lights at night, so they do their job perfectly! I’m

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Bought for my daughter for Christmas. They look cute in her bedroom. The only critique I would have is that they are not true “blackout” curtains. She had to order blinds to help block out the sun.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Black out curtains
reviews.reviewText: These are great curtains that block out so much light and weather tempatures.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: They are shorter than I expected..

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not blackout curtain
reviews.reviewText: Not a blackout curtain and the back is white not pink but the price is great, it's the right size, and it looks ok so I'm keeping it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars NOT BLACKOUT AT ALL
reviews.reviewText: NOT BLACKOUT CURTAINS AT ALL VERY DISAPPOINTED WITH ECLIPSE ON THESE ALSO COLOR IS NOT WHAT IS APPEARS VERY POOR CURTAINS

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love these curtains in my granddaughters bedroom. I bought this set to replace the same set that I had purchased several years ago. My one negative is that they don't look good after you've washed them. It seemed to wash some of the lining away so I replaced them with these.
Nice quality. Let’s a bit of light in but not bad.
No son totalmente eclipse pero cumplen y son de buen material

reviews.reviewTitle: No son Black Out pero son buenas cortinas
reviews.reviewText: NO son BLACK OUT(Como lo menciona la descripción)Son unas buenas cortinas, el material con el que están elaboradas se ve de buena calidad, la parte trasera de la cortina tiene un recubrimiento plástico el cual yo deduzco que es la tecnología thermoback y aísla el calor.Ya instaladas se nota un detalle curioso, con la luz solar cambia de color, entiendo que sea algo de cierta manera normal, porque las que pedí son azules y con la luz solar entrando se hizo verde.. Insisto puede ser normal por la luz solar pero si les gusta la perfección no son las adecuadas y reafirma que no son black out.También algo con lo que tuve que lidiar es el olor muy fuerte a plástico que desprendía y cuando les dio el sol el olor aumento, espero... Y pronto se desvanezca el olor.Por el precio que las compre vale la pena.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on May 31, 2019
reviews.reviewText: I did not like this item because it does not state clearly that there is only one curtain in this order. Who needs 1 curtain?

El articulo en su descripcion dice que son dos pzas, pero en realidad solamemte trae una pza, esto es una descripcion engañosa, ya que al momento de hacer la comora estoy esperando 2 pzas y solo recibi 1 pza.
